faqs.q: How many calories are in a head of romaine lettuce?
faqs.a: A medium head (~400 g) has about 68 kcal; scale from 17 kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: Is romaine lettuce low calorie for weight loss?
faqs.a: Yes, at 17 kcal per 100 g, it's very low and high in water and fiber for satiety.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in romaine lettuce?
faqs.a: About 3.3 g carbs per 100 g, including 2.1 g fiber and 1.2 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does romaine lettuce have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 1.2 g protein and 0.3 g fat per 100 g, mostly unsaturated.

faqs.q: How does romaine compare to iceberg lettuce calories?
faqs.a: Similar, around 14 kcal per 100 g for iceberg; romaine has more nutrients.
